Text: Ok, let me start off by saying THANK YOU! I am not complaining in any way. But when I watch this movie, it's pretty grainy. Is that my computer telling me I need a new video card? Awesome download, I love this movie, subtitles and everything works.

If you wan't to fully enjoy HD-movies a computer screen is not the right medium. A Plasma-screen is your only choice mate. The grainy look is simply because the pixels on a computerscreen are to big individually and ask yourself, how far away from the screen is your face, huh? Get my point?
I'm watching all my HD-downloads via my NAS on my EISA-Award winning, THX Approved, DTS-Certified Panasonic Plasma-screen and Blu-Ray 7.1 home cinema system.

^_^
Oh, and thx a lot mate, great upload!
